actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to restrict the unauthorized purchase of hypodermic needles and syringes.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to make hypodermic needles and syringes devices restricted to sale, distribution, or use only upon the written or oral authorization of a licensed practitioner.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to restrict the unauthorized purchase of hypodermic needles and syringes.
